description: Explore how Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are reshaping the landscape of philanthropy. This article delves into the use of NFTs for charity, their benefits, challenges, and inspiring examples of successful NFT-enabled charitable initiatives.
keywords: NFTs, philanthropy, charitable giving, digital assets, blockchain, fundraising, non-fungible tokens, charity, NFT marketplace, smart contracts
title: The Rise of NFTs for Charity: A New Era in Philanthropy
